import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' const Login = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false) const { email, password } = formData const handleChange = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(formData) } const handleShowPassword = () => { setShowPassword(!showPassword) } return (
